snippet: The man, a 35-year-old product designer, was charged with one count of possessing and one count of "promoting" child pornography for each of 1,544 graphic photos and videos of young girls found on his computer, the authorities said.
abstract: The man, a 35-year-old product designer, was charged with one count of possessing and one count of "promoting" child pornography for each of 1,544 graphic photos and videos of young girls found on his computer, the authorities said.

headline.main: Queens Man Charged With 3,000 Child Pornography Counts
headline.print_headline: Queens Man, 50, Dies in Explosion at Home
